pullrequest.title: Issue 182: Add optional bash script sourcing before executing a task

content.raw:
I admit I am not a fan of external templating engines, and I love triple quotes (and ''' too)

I'm not sure what style I like the best (using a %(var)  or a dictionary), but this particular method of concatenating strings has the side effect of being colorful when using syntax highlighting. I don't like the simple "  %s  %s " % (a,b) though.

Convince me and I will amend my ways.
content.html:
I admit I am not a fan of external templating engines, and I love triple quotes (and ''' too)

I'm not sure what style I like the best (using a %(var) or a dictionary), but this particular method of concatenating strings has the side effect of being colorful when using syntax highlighting. I don't like the simple " %s %s " % (a,b) though.

Convince me and I will amend my ways.
